QuestData.Title: Defiance
QuestData.Description: The damn mogu hit us out of nowhere! Anyone they don't kill on sight is being dragged away into the woods.$B$BThis is the only safehouse, and its all I can do to hold the door.$B$BWhat do you say, friend? Are you willing to stand up and fight for the weak?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Gormali Raiders and 8 Gormali Incinerators in Nectarbreeze Orchard.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice work, but there's more to be done if we are to save this village.
